description: An open source, tabbed, multi-protocol, remote connections manager.
pre_install: if (!(Test-Path "$persist_dir\mRemoteNG.settings")) { New-Item "$dir\mRemoteNG.settings" -ItemType File -Value "<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>"  | Out-Null }
if (!(Test-Path "$persist_dir\extApps.xml"    )) { New-Item "$dir\extApps.xml"   -ItemType File -Value "<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>"  | Out-Null }

if (!(Test-Path "$persist_dir\pnlLayout.xml"  )) { New-Item "$dir\pnlLayout.xml" -ItemType File -Value "<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?><DockPanel FormatVersion='1.0' DockLeftPortion='225.8' DockRightPortion='225.8' DockTopPortion='130.25' DockBottomPortion='130.25' ActiveDocumentPane='-1' ActivePane='0'>  <Contents Count='3'>    <Content ID='0' PersistString='mRemoteNG.UI.Window.ConnectionTreeWindow' AutoHidePortion='225.8' IsHidden='False' IsFloat='False' />    <Content ID='1' PersistString='mRemoteNG.UI.Window.ConfigWindow' AutoHidePortion='225.8' IsHidden='False' IsFloat='False' />    <Content ID='2' PersistString='mRemoteNG.UI.Window.ErrorAndInfoWindow' AutoHidePortion='130.25' IsHidden='False' IsFloat='False' />  </Contents>  <Panes Count='3'>    <Pane ID='0' DockState='DockLeft' ActiveContent='0'>      <Contents Count='1'>        <Content ID='0' RefID='0' />      </Contents>    </Pane>    <Pane ID='1' DockState='DockLeft' ActiveContent='1'>      <Contents Count='1'>        <Content ID='0' RefID='1' />      </Contents>    </Pane>    <Pane ID='2' DockState='DockBottomAutoHide' ActiveContent='2'>      <Contents Count='1'>        <Content ID='0' RefID='2' />      </Contents>    </Pane>  </Panes>  <DockWindows>    <DockWindow ID='0' DockState='Document' ZOrderIndex='1'>      <NestedPanes Count='0' />    </DockWindow>    <DockWindow ID='1' DockState='DockLeft' ZOrderIndex='2'>      <NestedPanes Count='2'>        <Pane ID='0' RefID='0' PrevPane='-1' Alignment='Bottom' Proportion='0.5' />        <Pane ID='1' RefID='1' PrevPane='0' Alignment='Bottom' Proportion='0.5' />      </NestedPanes>    </DockWindow>    <DockWindow ID='2' DockState='DockRight' ZOrderIndex='3'>      <NestedPanes Count='0' />    </DockWindow>    <DockWindow ID='3' DockState='DockTop' ZOrderIndex='4'>      <NestedPanes Count='0' />    </DockWindow>    <DockWindow ID='4' DockState='DockBottom' ZOrderIndex='5'>      <NestedPanes Count='1'>        <Pane ID='0' RefID='2' PrevPane='-1' Alignment='Right' Proportion='0.5' />      </NestedPanes>    </DockWindow>  </DockWindows>  <FloatWindows Count='0' /></DockPanel>"  | Out-Null }
notes: Default connections file is not persisted! Use a custom connection file insted.
On first run, you can load the default panel layout by using 'View'->'Reset Layout'.
